DDL.statement: ALTER TABLE `SYS_PRINTERS` MODIFY COLUMN `PRINTER_ID` varchar(30) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_0900_ai_ci NOT NULL FIRST;
